dcterms:creator: Jonathan Goh
Sridhar Adepu
Khurum Nazir Junejo
Aditya Mathur
dcterms:description: The SWaT dataset is used for research in cybersecurity and anomaly detection in critical infrastructure systems, collecting 51 sensor data from a real-world industrial water treatment plant at a frequency of one second, providing ground truths of 41 attacks launched during 4 days.
dcterms:title: SWaT (Secure Water Treatment)

dcterms:creator: Chuadhry Mujeeb Ahmed
Venkata Reddy Palleti
Aditya P Mathur
dcterms:description: The WADI dataset is collected from a water distribution testbed, simulating real-world water supply networks, collecting 121 sensor and actuator data at a frequency of one second, providing ground truths of 15 attacks launched during 2 days.
dcterms:title: WADI (Water Distribution)

dcterms:creator: Ahmed Abdulaal
Zhuanghua Liu
Tomer Lancewicki
dcterms:description: The PSM dataset aggregates performance metrics from multiple server nodes managed by eBay, utilized to identify outliers indicating potential issues in server performance or security breaches.
dcterms:title: PSM (Pooled Server Metrics)

dcterms:creator: Kyle Hundman
Valentino Constantinou
Christopher Laporte
Ian Colwell
Tom Soderstrom
dcterms:description: The MSL dataset originates from the Mars Science Laboratory rover, specifically the Curiosity rover, including telemetry data used to detect anomalies in the rover’s operational parameters during its mission on Mars.
dcterms:title: MSL (Mars Science Laboratory rover)

dcterms:creator: Ya Su
Youjian Zhao
Chenhao Niu
Rong Liu
Wei Sun
Dan Pei
dcterms:description: The SMD dataset comprises metrics from different server machines collected from a large internet company’s server farms, providing a basis for detecting unusual behaviors in server operations.
dcterms:title: SMD (Server Machine Dataset)
